survey_name: KYB Platform Overall Experience & NPS Survey

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the KYB Platform to a colleague or friend?
questions.description: Please rate on a scale of 0-10, where 0 is 'Not at all likely' and 10 is 'Extremely likely'

questions.question_text: Overall, how satisfied are you with the KYB Platform?
questions.description: Rate your overall satisfaction with the platform experience

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the platform to colleagues in your industry?
questions.description: Rate your likelihood of recommending the platform to industry peers

questions.question_text: How would you rate the value for money of the platform?
questions.description: Rate the value proposition and return on investment

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay for the KYB Platform?
questions.description: Based on your experience, would you pay for continued access to the platform?

options.true_label: Yes, I would pay for it
options.false_label: No, I would not pay for it

questions.question_text: What pricing model would work best for your organization?
questions.description: Select the pricing approach that would be most suitable

questions.question_text: What would you change about the platform?
questions.description: Please share specific changes or improvements you would make

options.placeholder: Describe changes or improvements you would make...

questions.question_text: What are the biggest benefits you've experienced from using the platform?
questions.description: Please describe the most valuable benefits and outcomes

options.placeholder: Describe the biggest benefits you've experienced...

questions.question_text: How much time has the platform saved you?
questions.description: Estimate the time savings compared to your previous process

questions.question_text: How accurate are the platform's results?
questions.description: Rate the accuracy of business classification, risk assessment, and compliance checking

questions.question_text: How has the platform improved your efficiency?
questions.description: Rate the improvement in your workflow efficiency

questions.question_text: How reliable has the platform been?
questions.description: Rate the platform's reliability and uptime

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the support provided?
questions.description: Rate your satisfaction with customer support and assistance

questions.question_text: How easy was it to implement the platform in your workflow?
questions.description: Rate the ease of integrating the platform into your existing processes

questions.question_text: What are your plans for using the platform after the beta?
questions.description: Select your intended use of the platform after the beta period

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to provide a testimonial or case study?
questions.description: If yes, please share your experience in a format we could use as a testimonial

options.placeholder: Share your experience for potential use as a testimonial...

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to refer other companies to the platform?
questions.description: Would you be comfortable referring other organizations to try the platform?

options.false_label: No, I would not refer others

questions.question_text: Any additional feedback or comments about your overall experience?
questions.description: Please share any other thoughts or feedback about your experience with the platform

options.placeholder: Share any additional feedback or comments...
